extendedInfo.description: _________________________________________CAMÃ DE CAVALLS_________________________________________'CamÃ­ de Cavalls 360Âº' is the perfect application guide to perform the route GR 223 (Minorca island). This route contains more than 200 cultural, historical and natural points of interest. The main sights are accompanied by images, videos and explanatory descriptions to provide an insight into this ancient trail.'CamÃ­ de Cavalls' (route GR 223) is a historical trail of 185 km that goes around the island by the coast. 'CamÃ­ de Cavalls' can be considered the best way to discover the great natural wealth and heritage of Minorca island, an island that combines almost all ecosystems in the Mediterranean sea.This route, being a sum of paths and trails, was born in late fourteenth century. Its original purpose was military, although it has had a large variety of uses throughout history. After decades of demands thanks to the involvement of citizens as well as public administrations, Gr 223 route has been reopened so that everyone can enjoy it again. _________________________________________HOW DOES IT WORK?_________________________________________By purchasing 'CamÃ­ de Cavalls 360Âº' the product includes the application itself as well as a free sample stage (Stage 2). Once the application has been downloaded, the user will always have the opportunity to buy other stages of 'CamÃ­ de Cavalls 360Âº' (0.79â¬ for each single stage, or 9.99â¬ for the whole pack of stages).Once the application and routes have been downloaded, internet connection will be no longer required. Remember that routes will be performed in anti-clockwise.When getting 10 meters close to a point of interest, you will automatically receive a notification message to open the touristic guide for that point. While you read the information, feel free to move across the field, on-screen information will remain displayed until you close it, or until you receive a notification of a new point.Note: You can also perfom other circuits not included in our materials, but remember that you will only be supported with the default map included in the application. All deviations and external circuits are very intuitive and might not be complicated to perform._________________________________________DESIGNED FOR ANDROID_________________________________________- Portrait or landscape- GPS Track recording with the screen off (up to 50% battery saving!)_________________________________________Transform your Android into a professional Outdoor GPS. All the information (tutorials, videos, tips, etc.) at http://mobile.twonav.comContinued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. Note: Application developed for devices with operating system 1.6 or higher.
